title: Modern Family star Sarah Hyland documents trip to ER with fiance Wells Adams by her side
text:
Modern Family's Sarah Hyland was taken to an emergency room Sunday, where her fiance Wells Adams was by her side.

The actress, 28, shared a series of clips via Instagram Stories as she spent time with her disc jockey beau, 35, while receiving medical attention amid an unspecified condition.

Hyland shared a series of shots, including a selfie that read, 'ER but make it fashion.'

Recovering: Modern Family's Sarah Hyland, 28, was taken to a nearby emergency room Sunday, where her fiance Wells Adams was by her side, receiving medical attention amid an unspecified condition

She and Adams, also known for appearing on ABC's Bachelor in Paradise and The Bachelorette, passed the time experimenting with a new filter on the social media site that projects dollar signs and contorts facial features.

Hyland joked with Adams, 'Oh my gosh look at you, you're an Instagram model now,' to which he said, 'Looks like I got punched in the face.'

The actress, who plays Haley Dunphy on the ABC series, is living with a chronic kidney condition, as she underwent a transplant after her father Edward donated a kidney to her in 2012.

In 2016, she learned that there were complications with the kidney. She told People last month of the discovery: 'When I found out, there was a nice cocktail of guilt, fear and a kind of hopelessness ... but also it was like, okay, this is now a part of your life.'

Fighter: The actress, who plays Haley Dunphy on the ABC series, is living with a chronic kidney condition

In the limelight: Adams established his name appearing on ABC's Bachelor in Paradise and The Bachelorette

In September 2017, she received another kidney transplant after her brother Ian donated a kidney.

She told the publication that it was in the same time frame she and Adams began seeing one another.

'I had all these health issues at the very beginning of our relationship,' she said, 'and then I was on massive amounts of painkillers in the hospital FaceTiming him at all hours of the day and night. He still liked me after that!'

Stunning: Hyland was seen at an Emmys bash September 20 in LA

Dedicated: The actress was seen last month in LA following a workout

Adams, who got engaged to the actress this past July, spoke with People last month about his mentality in staying strong for Hyland amid the tough times.

'I know it seems like this huge thing, but it didn’t feel like that,' he said. 'The way I always thought of it was, there’s going to be times in my life where I’m going to need to lean on her, and so this was just a time I was there for her.'

Prior to Adams, Sarah previously was in relationships with actors Dominic Sherwood, Matt Prokop and Max Ehrich.
description: The Modern Family beauty, 28, shared a series of clips via Instagram Stories as she spent time with her disc jockey beau, 35, while receiving medical attention amid an unspecified condition.
